Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant... the rapid-reaction channel is up ahead.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Everyone turns to stare in the direction of the mountain after Liv's sudden cry."}
{3: 'At the foot of the mountain, the snowmobile, so conspicuous in the endless whiteness, is speeding off, sending a huge blast of snow flying.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Why did he leave? We haven't paid yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...All our supplies are still on the snowmobile.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yamamoto', 3: "I told you we can't trust him! And yet you walked right into his trap!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clark shakes his hand, trying to make the youth stop.'}
